verbs.description: [ARG0: i] [V: tried] [ARG1: flying on iceland low - cost primera air] and learned first - hand that cramped seats and carry - on fees are n't even close to the biggest downside of budget airlines primera air is an ultra - low budget airline that recently began making transatlantic flights i was scheduled to fly with them on july 21 from paris to new york my flight was canceled after a four - hour delay one month later i still have n't been fully refunded the nearly 2 000 primera owes me iceland paris new york city primera air
